original_text: Those people show that they know what is right. It is as if God has written his Law deep inside them. Their thoughts tell them the difference between what is right and what is wrong. Sometimes their thoughts say: ‘You did something that is wrong.’ And sometimes their thoughts say: ‘You did what is right.’
korean_text: 이런 이들은 그 양심이 증거가 되어 그 생각들이 서로 혹은 고발하며 혹은 변명하여 그 마음에 새긴 율법의 행위를 나타내느니라)

sentences.original_text: Those people show that they know what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 옳은 것을 안다는 것을 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: It is as if God has written his Law deep inside them.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 하나님이 그들의 마음 깊은 곳에 법을 기록한 것과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their thoughts tell them the difference
between what is right and what is wrong.
